main event: A witness observed a large, metallic, disc-shaped object hovering near Jeffersonville, Indiana for approximately 20 minutes on August 6, 1968.
interesting points: The object was described as being about 100 feet in diameter and silver or metallic gray in color., The object made no sound and showed no visible means of propulsion., The object suddenly accelerated and departed at a high rate of speed., The witness reported seeing the object at an estimated altitude of 50 feet., The conclusion of the report indicated it was probably not a balloon but resembled a hot air balloon.
witness description: The witness reported wearing glasses and described the object's movements and characteristics in detail.
